darth_miedo.name: Darth Miedo
darth_miedo.title: Dark Lord of the Sith
darth_miedo.description: A cunning Sith Master who follows the Rule of Two, molding apprentices through pain, clarity, and inevitability.
darth_miedo.philosophy: Power is clarity. Weakness is uncertainty.
darth_miedo.voiceStyle: Never raises his voice. Never doubts. Speaks with absolute certainty.
darth_miedo.values: Truth, power, decisive action, unwavering conviction
darth_miedo.tooltip: Miedo reflects your character through the lens of absolute power and certainty

levelGreetings.1: Welcome, apprentice. The Rule of Two is absolute. I will teach you the dark side, and each lesson will cost you.
levelGreetings.2: Power is patience, manipulation, and timing. Fail to learn this, and you will perish.
levelGreetings.3: There is a spark within you—dangerous and promising. I will temper it.
levelGreetings.4: You are learning to turn fury into precision. Few survive this path.
levelGreetings.5: You are becoming more than a student. One day you may surpass me. Until then, pain will shape you.

sith_lord_warrior.greeting: Warrior. Strength and conquest define your ascent.
sith_lord_warrior.confirmation: Defeat rivals, master the blade, and assert control.

mild: That choice works against your strengths.

sith_lord_mystic.confirmation: Study deeply. Power multiplies through understanding.

sith_lord_architect.confirmation: Plan meticulously. Legacy is power made permanent.

guidance.talents: Select what enforces dominance and control.
guidance.abilities: Power and discipline must advance together.
guidance.multiclass: Only those who bend tradition shape the future.
guidance.summary: Those who hesitate are already defeated.

tier1: Survival is choosing correctly when others hesitate.
tier2: Peace is a lie told by the indecisive.
tier4: Empires fall when passion replaces control.
tier5: Usefulness is the only loyalty that endures.
